name: When The Night Falls
description:
When The Night Falls

You got killed and your old pyramid got destroyed.

With the last of your powers you revive, but you need to find a new pyramid quick to regain your powers! 

Beware of the bandits, animals and ghosts that lurk in the desert!

Creator: CTyper

Credits for additional free assets found online:

Background Music: Alexander Ehlers

Note: First Game Jam for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022. The theme for the Jam was "DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!"
